version_description:
Ver 3.4.0
- Expand our WiFi to Taiwan, Macau, Hong Kong!!
You can connect to internet only with our APP

We add Ad block function for free! This function will reduce your data usage for 20 - 80%, and speed up your page display.
Please turn on the setting from Manage tab.

Bug fix

We add Ad block function for free! This function will reduce your data usage for 20 - 80%, and speed up your page display.
Please turn on the setting from Manage tab.

Thank you for using TownWiFi!
- Bug fixes
- Fix an issue where 32-bit devices (iPhone 5, iPod 5th generation) could not update
- We also added an Ad block function for free! This function will reduce your data usage for 20 - 80%, and speed up your page display.
You can link to Ad block app from our APP

- Expand target WiFi
- Create WiFi NG list
- Create request free WiFi to your home
- We fixed not auto connecting bug
- Add search function at WiFi Map

* If you cannot update please reboot your phone
- Expand target Wi-Fi
- You can add registered required Wi-Fi to TownWiFi and automate it

- Improving call quality function is released
-> We will solve the problem which you cannot hear the voice when calling

Thank you for using TownWiFi. We update the app regularly to give you the best possible experience. This update includes the following improvements and features:

- Allow filtering by individual Japanese prefectures. You can now add auto-connect profiles for all prefectures at once (iOS 11 only)
- Moved WiFi usage analysis tab to a more central location to make it easier to use
- Added a feature to see how much data you saved by using WiFi, per-WiFi for current month and total
- Made it easier to search for nearby WiFi
- App now sends you a local notification when connecting to an unusable or malfunctioning WiFi. You can also add such WiFis to the 'Do not connect' list within the app
- Improved WiFi connection logic

Do you have experience that WiFi still connect to it even signal become weak?
If so, this update will solve that problem as we improve disconnect to slow WiFi function and check the signal strength.
Please update it!

Thank you for using TownWiFi. We update the app regularly to give you the best possible experience. This update includes the following improvements and features:

- Allow filtering by individual Japanese prefectures. You can now add auto-connect profiles for all prefectures at once (iOS 11 only)
- Moved WiFi usage analysis tab to a more central location to make it easier to use
- Added a feature to see how much data you saved by using WiFi, per-WiFi for current month and total
- Made it easier to search for nearby WiFi
- App now sends you a local notification when connecting to an unusable or malfunctioning WiFi. You can also add such WiFis to the 'Do not connect' list within the app
- Improved WiFi connection logic

Thank you for using TownWiFi. We update the app regularly to give you the best possible experience. This update includes the following improvements and features:

- Improved WiFi connection logic
Improve analyze function and display last month data

We expand our Wi-Fi cover country into 33 countries!! Country which we handle is following.

- Asia/Oceania
Japan, Taiwan, Korea, Macau, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Singapore, Viet Nam, Malaysia, Philippines, Australia, New Zealand

- North America
USA, Canada

- Europe
Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom

- Middle East
UAE

*bug fix

We expand our Wi-Fi cover country into 34 countries!! Country which we handle is following.
- Asia/Oceania
Japan, Taiwan, Korea, Macau, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Cambodia,Singapore, Viet Nam, Malaysia, Philippines, Australia, New Zealand

- North America
USA, Canada

- Europe
Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom

- Middle East
UAE

* add widget


We expand our Wi-Fi cover country into 34 countries!! Country which we handle is following.
- Asia/Oceania
Japan, Taiwan, Korea, Macau, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Cambodia,Singapore, Viet Nam, Malaysia, Philippines, Australia, New Zealand

- North America
USA, Canada

- Europe
Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom

- Middle East
UAE

- Change on boarding flow.
- Improve WiFi auto connect quality.

We delete wifi profile install function as there was a bug when installing profile at iOS13.1.
You can use manual connect and auto authentication.

- To use FreeWiFi smoothly, we create assist tab in bottom right. In that tab, there are "Disconnect from slow WiFi function" and "Stop connecting to useless WiFi function". Please check it out.
- We add WiFi auto connect function to assist tab.

Thank you for your continued support!

- Bug fix
- To use FreeWiFi smoothly, we create assist tab in bottom right. In that tab, there are "Disconnect from slow WiFi function" and "Stop connecting to useless WiFi function". Please check it out.
- We add WiFi auto connect function to assist tab.


Thank you for your continued support!

We make selectable recommend WiFi function. you can choose WiFi which you want to auto connect!
Person who is not yet add the profile, please add from banner or assist tab.

And you can use "disconnect from slow WiFi" function and "stop auto connect to certain WiFi" function if you connect to slow WiFi.

We will try to connect you to good WiFi and make your internet life great.

Easy access to the assist function.
You can choose from many options in "Do not connect to slow WiFi".
This is a recommended feature for people who want to watch videos with free WiFi!

Easy access to the WiFi auto connection settings.
This is a recommended feature for those who want to use free WiFi more and more!

Auto connection settings can be set from the recommended functions popover, yellow banner, and assist tab!
(It is not displayed for those who have already set.

To use Town WiFi more, we created an app guide on the Assist tab!
If you are not sure how to use it, or if you have installed it for the first time, please take a look.

We created a "Connect to surrounding WiFi" function that can connect WiFi from the app.
It will become easy to connect without troublesome login to comfortable WiFi.
This feature is also available on the Assist tab.

Bug fix

To use Town WiFi more, we created an app guide on the Assist tab!
If you are not sure how to use it, or if you have installed it for the first time, please take a look.

We created a "Connect to surrounding WiFi" function that can connect WiFi from the app.
It will become easy to connect without troublesome login to comfortable WiFi.
This feature is also available on the Assist tab.

Bug fix.
Fix auto connect function for some WiFis.
The app logo has been changed to join the GMO Internet Group.

The notification function has been improved to make it easier to see.
Please check the Messages tab > Info page for new features and support information!
You can also contact us about TownWiFi from here!

App will get the information from Beacon so app can receive WiFi information in the store! (This can be set from the Assist tab > Use Beacon)
In addition, we have added an outline of the terms of use to make easier to understand.

Bug Fix.
Add a network price diagnosis function.

- Bug Fix
- Move WiFi Simulation to main tab
SSID Wi2 is available at major cafes and highway buses, completely free!
Show the permission dialog for using IDFA, which is planned for the next iOS version update.
New applications for TownWiFi Mobile have been closed.
How to use Wi2 is now easier to understand.
